se.torgammelgard.config.web

Class WebConfig

  • Object
    • WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
      • WebConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aware, ServletContextAware, WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @ComponentScan(value={"se.torgammelgard.web","se.torgammelgard.api"})
 @EnableWebMvc
public class WebConfig
extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
implements ServletContextAware
    Customization of the Spring MVC configuration. The WebConfig extends an adapter, which is an implementation of WebMvcConfigurer with empty methods, which allows overriding only methods we are interested in.
